ComicInfo.Colorist: Ben Fernandez,Joe Chiodo,Monica Bennett,Paige Apfelbaum,Wendy Broome (Fouts),Joe Chiodo
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:13:29 [Issue ID 4000-107577] urn:comicvine:4000-107577 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:12:31. [Issue ID 54467]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Story continued from Cyberforce (1993 2nd Series) #2. It's all out war as the WildC.A.T.s and the cyborg mutant heroes of Cyberforce are manipulated into a no holds barred battle by the machinations of the woman called Misery. What is the secret from the past that connects Warblade and Ripclaw to this mysterious woman, and why are they willing to kill each other for her? Story concludes in Cyberforce (1993 2nd Series) #3.
Cyberforce arrives at the Isle of the Dead to investigate where the WildC.A.T.s are. Due to Misery's telepathy clouding Cyberforce's minds, they believe that the WildC.A.T.s are part of the Cyberdata and are bio-synthetic organisms created to cause trouble. WildC.A.T.s and Cyberforce battle on the island and Ripclaw and Misery are able to escape the melee, finding the technology that Misery really wanted from the island. Before they could escape, Warblade arrives for one final battle.
Continued in Cyber Force #3.
ComicInfo.Title: Killer Instinct Chapter Three: Showdown!
